data.text:
Alexandre Pato is the most talented and brightest man in the history of Brazilian football, with a net worth of around $ 145 million. In this article, we will demonstrate his net worth and how much he earns.

As one of the most prominent footballers, Alexandre Pato holds the position of 6th wealthiest footballer in the world. Alexandre Pato is the richest player who played for the Brazilian national team from 2008 to 2013. Interestingly, Alexandre Pato played for a variety of clubs such as AC Milan, Sau Paulo, Chelsea, Tianjin Quanjian, and many others. From an earlier age, he did hard work to become a skilled footballer.

Besides this, Alexandre Pato is the top scorer with millions of followers. Nowadays, everybody is interested to know about the net worth of Alexandre Pato. They want to know how much he earned from his football career. So, in this guide, we not only focus on his net worth but also represent his whole life, biography, and other details. Let’s get started without wasting any time.

Alexandre Pato Net Worth

According to estimates, the net worth of Alexandre Pato is estimated to be around $ 145 million. Apart from his football career, Alexandre Pato earns through contracts, collaboration, brand endorsements, and others. He makes almost 7 to 9 crores on single endorsements, which helps to increase his net worth.

Here is the record of Alexandre Pato’s net worth from 2019 to 2023 such as below.

Alexandre Pato Assets

Alexandre Pato has spent a lot on various properties and cars. He is living a luxurious life and lives in Brazil, Sao Paulo. Furthermore, if we talk about his collection of cars, Alexandre Pato has a huge collection of the most expensive cars. See David Beckham Net worth

Cars collection

Alexandre Pato Biography

Alexandre Pato’s early life

Alexandre Pato was born on September 2nd, 1989, in Brazil and played indoor football at only 3 years old. When he was eleven years old, Alexandre Pato was sharing club convenience with greater than eighty young men, all frantic to make it into the International 1st team. He completed his study in high school, and after that, he dropped out his school to pursue his football career.

Also Check: Richest Footballers in the world

Career

At age 17, Alexandre Pato made his 1st team debut in 2006. Alexandre won the FIFA Club World cup and was recorded as the young player to score in the club world cup in opposition to AL Ahly. Then, Alexandre Pato continued to turn heads at the International, and he helped the team to win. In the 2008 to 2009 season, he completed as Milan’s top scorer with fifteen Serie A goals.

Moreover, in the 2010 to 2011 season, he got an injury, but he scored fourteen goals. In London, he competed against Sweden and broke a 48-year record by becoming the youngest scorer in the contest. He won various medals like as bronze and silver 4 years in 2008 and 2012, respectively.

Awards

Alexandre Pato Personal Life

Alexandre Pato married Stefany Brito in 2009 at Copacabana Palace. But after ten months, they got separated in 2010. After that, he had a relationship with Barbara Berlusconi in 2013. Then in 2014, he married Rebeca Abravanel, who was a TV Presenter.
